title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Zimbabwe)
text:
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Zimbabwe is a <a href="Cabinet%20of%20Zimbabwe">cabinet</a> ministry of <a href="Zimbabwe">Zimbabwe</a>, responsible for conducting <a href="Foreign%20relations%20of%20Zimbabwe">foreign relations</a> of the country.
The current Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Trade is <a href="Frederick%20Shava">Frederick Shava</a>. He was appointed by <a href="President%20of%20Zimbabwe">President of Zimbabwe</a>, <a href="Emmerson%20Mnangagwa">Emmerson Mnangagwa</a>, being sworn in on 2 March 2021.
List of ministers.
